amendment.description: To prevent the selective admission of evidence and to provide for appropriate handling of classified and confidential materials.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1290 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 47. Record Vote Number: 21.

Amendment SA 1290 proposed by Senator Schumer. (consideration: S420, S420-422; text: CR S420) To prevent the selective admission of evidence and to provide for appropriate handling of classified and confidential materials.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1290 proposed by Senator Schumer.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1290 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 47. Record Vote Number: 21.
